column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Our group of 4 had a reservation on Sunday morning for brunch
column2: and we were seated right on time. My husband and I love brunch and have tried many of the Chicago favorites
column3: but this is our new favorite! There are so many options to choose from
column4: and the tapas style brunch is wonderful for those who are wanting to try a little bit of everything. Everyone in our group was thrilled with our selections. We ordered slightly too much food
column5: but I would recommend 7-8 dishes for a group of 4. The Nutella and banana waffles were my favorite item that we tried.
